snippet: Some immigrants who are in the country illegally are reluctant to apply for the licenses, fearing that the government might use the documentation to establish their identities and deport them.
abstract: Advocates of California program to offer driver's licenses to undocumented residents are confronting formidable obstacle of deep and longstanding mistrust of American government among illegal immigrant population; many immigrants who are in country illegally are reluctant to apply for licenses, fearing government might use documentation to establish their identities and deport them.
lead_paragraph: Some immigrants who are in the country illegally are reluctant to apply for the licenses, fearing that the government might use the documentation to establish their identities and deport them.

headline.main: California Driver’s License Program Hits an Unexpected Hurdle
headline.print_headline: Driver’s License Program in California Hits a Snag
